# Get Company

# Description

Retrieves a company in HubSpot CRM.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

* 
* Company - Select the company from the drop-down list or enter a custom company ID. You can retrieve the company ID from the output of an event trigger, a Create Company activity, or a List All Records → Companies (object) activity. This field supports String type input.









* Companies - Automatically generated output variable.
